header.gameNote: 2K SPORTS CLASSIC BENEFITING COACHES VS. CANCER

article.description: Ricky Harris scored 22 points to lead Massachusetts to a 90-71 win over Arkansas-Monticello in a regional round of the 2K Sports College Hoops Classic supporting Coaches vs. Cancer on Tuesday night.

related.description: Carlton Fay scored 16 points to lead Southern Illinois to a 66-52 win over California University of Pennsylvania on Tuesday night.
related.linkText: SIU runs over California, Pa. in 2K Sports Classic
related.title: Fay nets double-double as SIU tops California, Pa.
related.headline: Fay nets double-double as SIU tops California, Pa.

article.headline: Massachusetts charges past Arkansas-Monticello
article.linkText: UMass wins to move on to 2K Sports regional final
article.story: CARBONDALE, Ill. -- Ricky Harris scored 22 points to lead Massachusetts to a 90-71 win over Arkansas-Monticello in a regional round of the 2K Sports College Hoops Classic supporting Coaches vs. Cancer on Tuesday night. Chris Lowe added 18 points and 11 assists in Derek Kellogg's regular-season debut as head coach. Tony Gaffney had 16 points and 13 rebounds, and Anthony Gurley added 14 points for the Minutemen. UMass finished at 46 percent in shooting from the floor and 12-27, or 44 percent, from 3-point range. Raymond Wright had 25 points and 11 rebounds for Division II Arkansas-Monticello, which trailed 46-37 at the half. Deron Brown chipped in 11 points for the Weevils. UMass plays in the regional finals at Southern Illinois University on Wednesday. The winner goes to Madison Square Garden for the tournament semifinals and final.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
